mapper.insert: insert into SUBSINST_SYN_TEMP ( SYSTEMID, REGINID, PRODSPECCODE, USERIDTYPE, PRODUCTNO, VPRODUCTID, SPID, PRODUCTOFFERTYPE, PRODOFFERID, STATUS, SUBSCRIBETIME, EFFDATE, EXPDATE, CHANNELPLAYERID, DEAL_FLAG, OUT_PARAM, CREATE_DATA ) values ( #{systemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reginid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodspeccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useridtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vproductid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productoffertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodofferid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelplayerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
